Welcome to the Employee Productivity Prediction Platform

This application utilizes advanced Machine Learning (ML) models to forecast the actual productivity of garment workers and manufacturing lines. By analyzing a range of operational and environmental factors, we provide actionable insights for optimizing workforce performance.

Our Mission

  • Identify key drivers of productivity.
  • Predict potential shortfalls or peaks in output.
  • Make informed decisions to enhance operational efficiency.
